description: Docbyte is a leading organization that provides intelligent technologies to various knowledge worker organizations, from banks and insurers to any enterprise in the field of information security, preservation, and document processing.
Their platform helps to automate document processes and preserve digital information, enabling the clients to prepare for a fully digital future.
• Accident management - solving incident/bug tickets and acting as a mediator between engineering and service desk
• During the accident management procedure over 300 tickets were solved for the period of 12 months
• Migrating legacy on-premise apps towards cloud serverless AWS Lambda solution
• Integrating Amazon Textract as an OCR solution for the cloud infrastructure
• Documenting the flow in C4 architectural diagram
• Following ISO 27001/9001/QTSP standards in the ecosystem of Docbyte
• Leading the daily meetings, when team lead was not available
• Testing framework: Quarkus Test Framework JUnit 4
• Database: AWS DynamoDB, Amazon Relational Database (RDS), PostgreSQL
• Application server: AWS SAM (Serverless Application Model)
• Identity/access management: KeyCloak, AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)
• OCR: Google AI, Amazon Textract, Native OCR
• Production methodology: Scrum, sprints of two weeks
• Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) – experience with high-volume, AI-enhanced document capture and classification
• Document Management – deep involvement in document lifecycle workflows, from ingestion to storage and compliance
• Compliance-Centric Systems – work aligned with ISO 27001, ISO 9001, and QTSP standards
• Legacy System Modernization – transforming on-premise .NET-based platforms to modern serverless AWS architectures
• Enterprise Content & Records Management – exposure to OpenText Captiva and related ECM platforms
